recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and freshly ground black pepper
instructions: Cook spaghetti in a large pot of salted boiling water until al dente. Reserve 1/2 cup of pasta water, then drain spaghetti.
In a mixing bowl, whisk together eggs and Parmesan cheese. Season with salt and pepper.
In a large skillet, cook pancetta over medium heat until crispy. Add garlic and cook for another minute.
Add cooked spaghetti to the skillet with pancetta and garlic. Toss to combine.
Remove skillet from heat and quickly pour in egg mixture, stirring continuously to coat the spaghetti. If the sauce is too thick, add reserved pasta water as needed.
Serve immediately, garnished with chopped parsley and additional Parmesan cheese if desired.

recipes.title: Chicken Stir-Fry
recipes.description: A quick and easy stir-fry recipe with tender chicken and colorful vegetables, tossed in a flavorful sauce.
ingredients: 1 lb boneless, skinless chicken breasts, sliced
2 cups mixed vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots, snap peas, etc.), sliced
Sesame seeds and sliced green onions (for garnish)
instructions: In a small bowl, mix together soy sauce, hoisin sauce, rice vinegar, and sesame oil. Set aside.
Heat a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add a tablespoon of oil.
Add sliced chicken to the skillet and cook until browned and cooked through. Remove from skillet and set aside.
In the same skillet, add another tablespoon of oil if needed. Add minced garlic and grated ginger, and cook for 1 minute.
Add mixed vegetables to the skillet and stir-fry until tender-crisp.
Return cooked chicken to the skillet. Pour the sauce over the chicken and vegetables, and toss to coat everything evenly.
Serve hot over cooked rice, garnished with sesame seeds and sliced green onions.

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.description: Classic homemade chocolate chip cookies that are soft, chewy, and full of chocolate chips.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Line baking sheets with parchment paper.
In a small bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, and salt. Set aside.
In a large mixing bowl, beat together butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar, and vanilla extract until creamy.
Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition.
Gradually add flour mixture to the wet ingredients, mixing until just combined.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Drop tablespoon-sized balls of dough onto prepared baking sheets, spacing them about 2 inches apart.
Bake in preheated oven for 9-11 minutes, or until cookies are golden brown around the edges.
Allow cookies to cool on baking sheets for a few minutes before transferring to wire racks to cool completely.

recipes.title: Caprese Salad
recipes.description: A simple and refreshing Italian salad made with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, basil, and balsamic glaze.
ingredients: Salt and freshly ground black pepper
instructions: Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices on a serving platter, alternating them and overlapping slightly.
Tuck fresh basil leaves between the tomato and mozzarella slices.
Drizzle extra virgin olive oil over the salad.
Season with salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste.
Drizzle balsamic glaze over the salad in a decorative pattern.
Serve immediately as a refreshing appetizer or side dish.
